item.description:
The Boston Arts Festival is this weekend! Come out and see local visual and performing ähts ...I mean arts!

Let's meet in front of Old Town Trolley Tours next to the Blue Line's Aquarium Station at noon on Sunday. From there, we'll walk to the festival taking place at nearby Christopher Columbus Park. The group will visit the two stages where performances will alternate every thirty or forty-five minutes, and the artists' village, which will have some really cool stuff both on display and for sale!

For those who get lost easily (me!), my cell number will be emailed to all 'yes' and 'maybe' RSVPs on Saturday night. Hope to see you there!
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be standing in front of Old Town Trolley Tours wearing dark, thick-rimmed glasses and a bright green t-shirt.
item.name: Boston Arts Festival (ähts) on Sunday 9/12
